screenshots.accessibilityText: A test with Doregon's Internal Server.

views.markdown:
## Minecraft: Java Edition comes to iOS.
Based off of the Android port of the same name, PojavLauncher brings the comforts of Java Edition to the portability of your iDevices.
### Your favorite worlds.
__PojavLauncher is straight up Java Edition__--meaning that your existing Java worlds will work perfectly with it! Bring them over and easily put them in place and forget.
### Mods? Shaders? Welcome.
PojavLauncher supports (some) shaders and many, many mods. With baked in Forge, OptiFine, and Fabric 1.16.5 compatibility, you'll get access to things you only dreamed of on your device.
### Open-source. Completely free.
The first ever Minecraft: Java Edition launcher for iOS devices, made better with active development and an open codebase. You can see for yourself at https://bit.ly/3bmjWZh!

### Changes
- Use new method for Microsoft login
- Moved latestlog.txt and overrideargs.txt to /var/mobile/Documents/.pojavlauncher
- WIP custom controls and external mouse support
### Fixes
- Fix file permission issues during install of package
- Hide home bar like Bedrock Edition
- Properly hide iPad status bar
### Known issues
- Crash if login to Microsoft fails
- Several Forge versions won’t work due to removed deprecated classes (see #67 and #68)
- Text input will not work on 1.12.2 and below
#### A full changelog can be found at https://bit.ly/2RihpZl

### Changes
- Changed button offset for avoiding notch cutout on iPhone X and newer
- Forge 1.13+ (not all) and Fabric API are now supported
- Mojang authentication was re-written, so it should work now
### Fixes
- Fixed random crashes occur while Minecraft is initializing
### Known issues
- Crash if login to Microsoft fails
- Several Forge versions won’t work due to removed deprecated classes (see #67 and #68)
- Text input will not work on 1.12.2 and below
#### A full changelog can be found at https://bit.ly/3uG5AuB

### Features
- Login with Mojang (might not work), Microsoft (not tested) or offline
- Multiplayer and joining servers works
- Bedrock-like gestures, as if using split controls
### Limitations
- Forge and Fabric won't work
- Jailbreak is required in order to install OpenJDK and PojavLauncher
#### A full changelog can be found at https://bit.ly/33Gji4L
